name: Open Tamagotchi
description:
Hi everyone, I would like to share what I created while I was reading a Game Development Degree on the programming path at Glyndwr University in Wrexham. The Unreal 4.25 project is an automatic game of Tamagotchi for a module called Games Programming in the first Semester of Level 5. The game is called Open Tamagotchi.

 

In the future, I would like to implement a feature whereby the player could control the Tamagotchi with the keyboard or plug in a controller. The Tamagotchi will have toys and food to interact with.

 

I made the game on Unreal 4.25 on a Windows 10 64bit computer with Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 CPU @ 3.40GHz  and 16 GB of RAM. If you have similar specifications, you can run the game without any difficulty.

Please note: You might notice the widgets’ size can alter depending on the size of your computer display or monitor. I used 1920x1080.
